Title: Since 1500, Chapters 15-30.
Subtitle: The Earth and Its Peoples: A Global History.
Authors: Richard W. Bulliet.
Categories: Science.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=DS0C7QE9ZvwC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The Earth and Its Peoples Brief Edition is a compact presentation of world history with a comparative approach and a global, balanced perspective. The themes of "Environment and Technology" and "Diversity and Dominance" unite the regions of the world. The Earth and Its Peoples Brief Edition offers a high level of scholarship with a supportive, student-friendly format..
